reviews.review_text: I have to give a shout out to the parts department. The person working there had excellent mechanical knowledge of cars and had great customer service, I had a no start issue with my truck and it turn out his suggestion about the starter coils was correct. Especially since my Dodge dealership failed to understand the issue and find the fault. Also want to commend him for his patience with the number of customers requiring his help.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the fantastic 5-star review! Were thrilled to hear about your positive experience with our parts department. Its great to know that our staff provided excellent mechanical knowledge and outstanding customer service. Were glad they were able to correctly diagnose and resolve the issue with your truck, especially when your Dodge dealership couldnt. Well make sure to pass along your compliments and commendation for their patience. Were here to help, and your satisfaction is important to us. We look forward to serving you again in the future! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: The Garden Center at Canadian Tire this Year is Superb.  Better Prices and WAY more selection and variety than the Lowes and Home Depot close by. A shame Canadian Tire is associating itself with the Retail Failure London Drugs in a shared Flyer.  Makes me not look at it and throw it out.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your fantastic review! Were delighted to hear that you had an excellent experience at our Garden Center. Providing a wide selection and variety of products at competitive prices is something we take pride in. Your satisfaction is our priority, and were thrilled to know that we surpassed the offerings of other nearby stores. We appreciate your support and look forward to being your top choice for all your gardening needs. If theres anything else we can do to enhance your experience, please let us know. Nice photos... Happy gardening!

reviews.review_text: Very often you can get discounts on wheels in this store.Also, you don t have to wait long, you can register for literally the next day.The staff was polite and courteous.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words! Were delighted to hear you had a great experience with us. Providing discounts and prompt service is our priority, and were pleased you noticed our polite and courteous staff. We look forward to serving you again soon! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Awesome customer service and the supervisor at the key replacement booth saved my butt. They were able to duplicate 5 different keys (mailbox, pad locks, drawers) that the minutekey machine couldnt.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were thrilled to hear about your positive experience! Our team takes pride in assisting customers like you, and were glad we could help with your various key replacements. Thank you for your 5-star review, and we look forward to assisting you again in the future if needed. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Went shopping the day before the so-called  Black Friday sale not expecting anything but average pricing. Was absolutely thrilled to have spent no more than my budget could afford and managed to buy the name brand products I intended to purchase at amazingly low discount pre-sale prices. I saved enough to complete my project and then some. Staff encountered were available, friendly and helpful answering the questions I had for them. No hassle check-out and I was out the door for curb side pick up.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Doug! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Bill Clarke Service advisor @ Granview Hwys location was able to source parts on Easter Monday , after carefully diagnosing Battery-Alternator was the issue .we had a Game plan & an exact price .The Team including  Nathan were all pros and the car was  back by suppertime. EXCELLENCE on a Holiday Weekend That deserves a GOOD Review !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing your outstanding experience with us and leaving a glowing review! We are thrilled to hear that Bill Clarke went above and beyond to source parts for your vehicle on Easter Monday and carefully diagnosed the issue with your battery and alternator. We are proud to have a team of professionals, like Bill and Nathan, who provided you with excellent service and worked efficiently to have your car repaired and back to you by suppertime. We appreciate your recognition of our teams commitment to providing exceptional service. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Every time Im here its always a wonderful shopping experience. Love all the products they sell, especially the heater in the pictures. I own multiple units of this model. (Works well) They sell lots of great brands known as: Honeywell Mastercraft Noma. Quality of their products are great. (Their stuff is better than Walmart) Good prices! Excellent customer service! Convenient Location! What more can you ask for...PERFECT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Ray! We really appreciate the 5 stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. Nice photos! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: A big, busy store but when I connected with an employee the service was earnest and helpful. The garden center is good. Always a seasonal section of deals. And you can shop with your dog! Bonus Points!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi John, thanks for the rating and review. We really appreciate the 5 stars and hope to see you and your dog again soon! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Security guy i guess named krris downstairs was very helpful and nice, came here in the morning around 10, made my day with a big smile.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience with us! Were thrilled to hear that our security team member made your day with a big smile. Well be sure to pass along your kind words to him. We appreciate your support and look forward to serving you again. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Great size of store. I appreciate that they please ask that you DO NOT leave your dog in your car.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Stephen! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: I popped into Canadian Tire to look for a few bedding plants.  I couldnt believe that they actually had some that were still alive and flourishing.  It took me a while to find my Begonias and I went in to pay.  I was approached by a lovely young woman who helped me ring through the plants.  It was obvious that she had done this before and it made the transaction so easy.  Thanks for all of your help. This location is way out of my way, but definitely worth going to.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Chi, Were pleased to know you are satisfied with your shopping experience. Thanks for taking the time to provide us with a 5-star rating! Were happy you made the trip to our store even though its out of your way and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Love the idea that they are a dog friendly establishment. Staff are so getting and nice with kids and dogs.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sandra, Were thrilled to receive your 5-star review! It warms our hearts to know that you appreciate our dog-friendly policy and that our staff made your experience enjoyable for both kids and dogs. We strive to create a welcoming environment for everyone, and its wonderful to hear that it made a positive impact on your visit. Thank you for choosing us, and we cant wait to welcome you, your kids, and your furry friend back soon! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: A wonderful place filled with tools, camping gear, kitchen gadgets, car parts and toys. They sell kids toys too. Only thing that would make it better is if they had a bar in it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Shane! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Nice environment. And some tips for you: You can search the item you want on their website, they will show you clearly which aisle and which area you can find the product. Way better than asking a staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Enson! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Two young employees inflated my helium balloons for me at the party city counter and they were very helpful. The price was great too!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were pleased to know you are satisfied with your shopping experience, Keenan. Thanks for taking the time to provide us with a 5-star rating! We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Is there anything more Canadian than going shopping at a Canadian Tire on a Saturday morning for things you dont need but that all make you happy and improve your home & garden? I think not!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your fantastic 5-star review! We agree, theres nothing quite as Canadian as a Saturday morning trip to Canadian Tire for things that make you happy and improve your home and garden. Were here to help you with all your needs, and we cant wait to welcome you back for more shopping adventures! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: The Asian gentle Tao in part department was really helpful. I was very confused and he helped me with all my parts and explain to me. My first time buying parts for my car. I bought the wrong oil but he helped me find the right oil and many other parts.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience at the store. Were delighted to hear that the Tao was able to assist you in finding the right oil and other parts. We appreciate your business and hope to serve you again in the future. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: I went into Canadian Tire with a gift card. The staff helped me with the card, and then said if you need us to help you with your purchases you can bring them here. I thanked them, then asked were some products were. They helped me happily. A lot of friendly people helping me. I go to the aisle and am wondering about something, and there is a staff member who explained everything I needed to know. I have my purchases, and go to check-out. I tell a young man I need help because of my damaged gift card. He says I will help you. He is fun and friendly, and BOOM everything is taken care of. I have my stuff and he says Happy New Year early madam! SO cute. It was a very good experience with a lot of very helpful and friendly staff. Thank you, because you were super SUPER busy.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Junadi! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Today they have great sales everyone is working so hard to keep the place nice organized and shiny lots of sparkling lights it feel like xmas i was so excited,  they have xmas flowers every where I wanted to buy all of them
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Liliana! Were delighted you noticed our team efforts to create the feeling of Christmas and our Christmas flowers are extra beautiful this year... Nice photos!! We hope to see you again soon! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Im here to say thank you to the wonderful customer service lady-Mia- for being extremely helpful. I hadnt brought the receipt of something that I had to return, unfortunately. Although it was my wrong to show up without the receipt, she went above and beyond to find the item on my account, and was nothing but exceptionally nice. Great customer service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5-star review and share your positive experience with us! We are thrilled to hear that Mia was able to provide you with exceptional customer service and went above and beyond to assist you in returning your item. We will be sure to share your feedback with Mia and the rest of our team. Thank you for choosing our store and we look forward to serving you in the future! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: I love the escalator, I can see everything from the top. Above all, their washroom is spacious and clean.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Ja! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Very happy with my purchase of their tool Cabinet at Canadian Tire Grandview. Shout out to Kelsey for sorting my issue out and thanks to their sister location at Cambie for supplying the replacement. 5 star service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Peter! We will be sure to recognize Kelsey for helping sort out the issue. Enjoy your new tool cabinet. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Automotive Department is very good. Yesterday I had problem with my van. Technical Advisor took care immediately and communicate with me by phone. Even with busy schedule put my van through services and all diagnostics and repair was done by end of the day. On the end he suggested 24 months, equal payments. Im very happy with work done and customer service. This department still makes me happy.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Ben! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Biggest Canadian Tire I have ever been to! Good amount of free parking as well which is nice. Also located with several other stores nearby. Had the bolt i couldnt find at homedepot. Easy to locate product and cheap! Thanks!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a positive review! Were glad to hear that you had a great shopping experience at our store and that you were able to find the product you needed easily. Its great to know that our stores large size and convenient location, as well as the availability of free parking, contributed to your positive experience. We hope to see you again soon! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: This is one of the nicest Canadian Tires I ve ever been in! Great selection and surprisingly helpful staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Trey, Were pleased to know you are satisfied with your shopping experience. Thanks for taking the time to provide us with a 5-star rating! We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Came here after doing an online order to pick up. Pickup is on the main floor behind the elevators in this small corner. Friendly service otherwise!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Jackson! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Good help in store even if your acting blind like I sometimes do, having the looked for item right behind me. They have products you can t find anywhere else like Noma heaters. Effective and low on electricity usage. They will deliver if you need them to. The delivery fee is in keeping with the current gas prices.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Anita! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Thank you Cynthia at customer service Went to pay a bill at customer service.  My debit card wouldnt let me. With Cynthias help i was able to complete my bill payment.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words and positive review! We are thrilled to hear that Cynthia at our customer service was able to assist you in completing your bill payment despite encountering issues with your debit card. We take pride in providing excellent customer service, and its wonderful to know that Cynthia was able to help you resolve the situation. We will be sure to pass along your appreciation to Cynthia for her assistance. Thank you for choosing Canadian Tire Grandview! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Store that has everything.  The one at Grandview Hwy is big and clean.  Their displays are always fully stocked.  2 levels of fun.  I always enjoy strolling through big box stores and this is one of them.  Theres always a wait to pay here, though. I dont know why as you can see lots of CT associates floating around the store.  When they have a sale though, they really give a big discount, as you can see in my picture.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback Karen the team sure works hard to ensure the store is clean and well stocked so Im pleased to hear about your positive experience shopping in our store. We will be sure to work on improving the wait times at checkout for your next visit. - Chris, General Manager

reviews.review_text: I always find everything that I need here! I absolutely love it!!! The staff is incredibly helpful as well. Amazing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, John! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: AMAZING customer service! there was a problem with my online order for a sold out item & the girl (i didn t get her name) was so kind to put aside an extra one in the back for me! will definitely come back
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are thrilled to hear that our team member was able to provide you with amazing customer service and went above and beyond to help you with your online order. Well be sure to share this feedback with our online team. Thanks for taking the time to share your experience we look forward to serving you again. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Love this place. Every time I go there I spend a huge amount of time, checking things aisle by aisle.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were delighted to hear that you love our store! Its wonderful to know that you enjoy spending time exploring every aisle. Your dedication to finding what you need is greatly appreciated, and we look forward to your next visit. Thank you for choosing us! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Whatever you are looking for you can likely find it here. Sporting goods, home renovation supplies, plumbing, paint, lighting, small appliances, hardware and more. An iconic Canadian shopping experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-stars, Frank. We greatly appreciate your kind words and are thrilled to hear that we have been able to provide you with a wide range of products to meet your needs. We take pride in offering a diverse selection of sporting goods, home renovation supplies, plumbing, paint, lighting, small appliances, hardware, and much more. Its wonderful to know that you found our store to be an iconic Canadian shopping experience. Thank you again for your generous review and for choosing CT Grandview. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Great service and nice staffs. Huge selection of everything you need the most for home repair, materials, homeware, auto parts, and so on. Lots of free parking available on site.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your glowing 5-star review! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with our service and found our staff to be friendly and accommodating. Its also wonderful to know that our store offers a wide selection of items, including home repair materials, homeware, and auto parts, to cater to your needs. We understand the importance of convenient parking, and were glad to provide ample free parking on site for our valued customers like you. We appreciate your feedback and hope to continue providing you with excellent service in the future. Thank you for choosing Canadian Tire Grandview! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Staff was very friendly and helpful. Within seconds of arriving in the trash can aisle I was assisted in finding what I needed as well as finding someone to get additional stock from an upper shelf. Wish I noted their names.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Vivean! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Im going to forget the time I came to the store before closing time and you were already closed and give you 5 stars. This store is one of the most organized and easiest shopping experiences time and again. The staff get you through the self checkout quickly and are keen to help. Yesterday I was doing curbside pickup and in the same way everything went smooth as butter. Thank you!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Albbert! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: I am giving this location 5 stars because of their garden /plant section and the lady who usually works there. My guess is that she must run that section, as she has an absolutely amazing knowledge of plants. Aside from being so knowledgeable she is also extremely friendly and professional. The plant selection here is one of the best if not the best in the city. You can find all kinds of exotic (healthy) plants here that you will have a difficult time finding somewhere else. Also all of your questions will be answered :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your 5-star experience, Aleksandra! We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Good service - we found a badminton net, rackets, birdies and a ratchet fastener.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were pleased to know you are satisfied with your shopping experience, Earl. Thanks for taking the time to provide us with a 5-star rating! We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Party supply section
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We really appreciate the 5-stars and love the photos of our Party City section... we look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: One of the bigger and better locations.  It has a huge fishing section and outdoor section upstairs.  Staff are generally knowledgeable.  Most products are in stock and they have a larger variety of options since it is a larger location.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a positive review of our store, Rozsika. Were glad to hear that you found our location to be spacious and well-stocked, particularly in the fishing and outdoor sections. Were also glad to hear that our staff was knowledgeable and able to assist you. We look forward to your next visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Though not the biggest branch, but still offer many goods (and during Monday Clearance, this branch do offer the best possible price.)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were pleased to know you are satisfied with your shopping experience. Thanks for taking the time to provide us with a 5-star rating! We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Purchased the NOMA IQ portable Air Conditioner from this location. I was assisted in this purchase by Nolando working on the second floor and he was just amazing. He helped me carry the product to my car, found an empty counter for me to finish the payment quickly, gave tips on how to use the product correctly and was very friendly and helpful despite being extremely busy. I just had one part of the entire purchase that was a bit weird. The product is working fine but the no return/refund policy was weird. I initially thought that it would just be on this brand but when I checked, it was present for all AC products, it was not brand specific. I am not sure of the reason of this policy but that was the case when I visited this outlet. I do believe that any issues we can address with the brand itself.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are delighted to hear this about Nolando and will be sure to recognize him for his efforts. ACs are exchangeable under warranty if there is an issue. Hope this helps. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: When I go shopping or out for entertainment, I believe customer service is the most important part of the experience! This Canadian Tire store is filled with amazing customer service excellence. When ever I visit I am always given courteous, prompt, efficient service with genuine smiles and lots of care and diligence on making my time in the store a great experience! The management team should be proud of  Excellent Customer Service their staff provides! Bill, Brandon, Minh are just a few of the the super stars at that location! Thank You !!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for taking the time to share this feedback, Chris. Its rewarding to hear this about our amazing team members and I will be sure to recognize them for their efforts in focusing on providing great service to our valued customers like you. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Mladen, General Manager

reviews.review_text: Min in auto parts is knowledgable, honest, and direct. He leads by example. Hope this transpires into a wage increase or position for him!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are delighted to hear this feedback, Matthew! We will be sure to recognize Min for his efforts. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: This location is what all Canadian Tire location should aspire to be ! They seem to have all the items the other locations lack or are always out of, I needed pump saver for my Pressure washer,  almost all the other locations were out, some had 1 or 2 listed in the inventory but when I went to those locations,  they didnt have any,  this location did, whenever I go here I always want to go camping,  they have so much more than other locations I have been to. Check this location out,  I am sure you will find what you need !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Mike! We really appreciate the 5-stars review and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Did a return for luggage that was damaged after one flight. They did a return for store credit and I was happy with that.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Leanna! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Easy to find things especially if you have the app and the current location of store
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Pravesh! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Every time I go to Canadian tier I find something that I like and more, I love this store, people should know Canadian tire is The Store, you can find anything and everything in there, including Kitchen stuff which most of the time are on special, check it out, you will not regret it, in fact it will be your new Favourite store, you may say, really? Canadian tier? and I say yes Canadian Tier, Just pay them a visit you will see,
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Essi! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Large store thats well laid out per 3 floors. Recently purchased a canopy, but it had a broken clip, exchanged it with no issues. Great customer service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, David! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Today I experience one of the best service at a Canadian Tire, thank you to Mei Lin, who was busy at the time but was very courteous and as soon as she finish helping the customer before me, she came right back to help me. In no time at all, she located the car shelter in the warehouse, had it on a cart waiting for me and even help me in loading it onto my vehicle. I couldnt be more please, keep up the good work!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We really appreciate the 5-stars and will be sure to recognize Mei Lin for her efforts. Thanks for taking the time to share your experience! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Absolutely great service. Very knowledgeable and accommodating staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Carmela, Thank you so much for your wonderful review! Were delighted to hear that you had an absolutely great experience with our knowledgeable and accommodating staff. Providing top-notch service is our priority, and your feedback motivates us to continue delivering exceptional service to all our customers. CT Grandview Team We look forward to serving you again in the future!

reviews.review_text: very nice store the staff there was really helpful. kinda hard to find staff sometimes but u just really gotta wait a little bit n then u can find them. they had the socket i needed but then i couldn t use it afterwards but it s like ok cuz it was my fault really but besides that very helpful the staff was really nice even tho i called her back 2 times cuz i changed my mind like asap but like it s nice that she was like coming back to help us anyways like thanks employee i d say more but like i don t like know ur name
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: The only one in town with a fire arms section. Joe is extremely professional and personable. I love coming here to kill time!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kelvin, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a 5-star review! We are thrilled to hear that you appreciate our firearms section and that Joe provided you with professional and personable service. Its our goal to create a welcoming and enjoyable atmosphere for all of our customers, and were glad to know that weve succeeded in providing you with a place to kill time. We look forward to seeing you again soon! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Great experience and well run establishment! Will be back for sure!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Andrew, Thank you so much for your kind words! Were thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with us and found our establishment well-run. We look forward to welcoming you back and providing you with exceptional service once again. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Alyssa is the definition of customer service. End of story. I was a day late with a flyer item and wondered why it was a 10$ difference only when I got home. She understood and gave me the flyer price. Such a great experience
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are delighted to hear about this 5-star experience. We are lucky to have Alyssa on our team and will recognize her for her great customer service. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit Katie. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Had an initially not great starting experience because they didn t want to give me a refund on unopened/unused Christmas lights (lights were super bright so returned all three boxes). Was a bit shocked but I knew why and the policy is on their receipt so can t blame them, only myself for not reading the receipt clearly. HOWEVER Bonnie and the store manager (I presume) were super nice and accommodating and allowed me store credit that I promptly used right back into the store. THANK YOU for turning this situation around making an initially not great experience into one of exceeding my customer expectations. Very pleased with the outcome and the way Bonnie was trying to help me. This is one Canadian Tire I will make sure to visit often (it s a bit older but there s free parking and starbucks nearby so win win!).
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We value your rating and feedback Bee W thanks for taking the time to share your experience. Were happy Bonnie was able to make things right and will be sure to recognize her. We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Looked for what I wanted online. It tells you exactly where in the store all products are located and how many are in stock too.  I went straight to the aisle picked up my things.  Went to the cash out. Was very quick even though a bit busy. The cashier was able to scan my heavy items without even me lifting a finger. Great experience.  They even have great delivery service too only$5 for most items mine where heavy so I decided to go shopping in person like the old days! Had a great time and Im very happy with the products and services.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback, Jonathon. Were happy to hear the online inventory and location made for a convenient experience. We value your business and hope to see you again soon! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: I go to this location quite often as its close to work but I also like this location because all of the staff are knowledgeable and are very helpful whenever I need help finding something! Terry helped me find an air conditioning unit that was in stock but not yet on the floor as it was just delivered. He got it from the back, his coworker gave me some advice on what to do when I brought it home, and Terry even helped me load it into my car.
Parking is very easy and many things to shop here
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Dennis, Were pleased to know you are satisfied with your shopping experience. Thanks for taking the time to provide us with a 5-star rating! We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Bonnie helped me at the check out and she was fantastic. Very efficient, proactive, and made my transaction very easy since there was low stock on the item I was looking for. She even tried to get me a better condition box for the Dyson I was buying because she saw I wanted a gift receipt. She made my day and it is so good to see people who work with such passion and dedication and positive energy in times like this. She deserves commendation.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were sure lucky to have team members like Bonnie, she is amazing, Im glad you noticed. Its rewarding for our team to hear such positive feedback especially during these challenging times. We appreciate you taking the time to provide this reveiw and will be sure to recognoze Bonnie for her efforts. Thanks for the 5-stars, Aaron! Chris, General Manager

reviews.review_text: Staff was super helpful and friendly. I found an item that I had thought was a different price. They did a price check for me and also found another item that worked for me. They were very helpful.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Chanh! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Whenever I Hear Canadian Tire I always think of this place. They have lots of great item for cheap, has been great supplier for all my knives and the employees have always been helpful and supportive. Whenever my friends come here we always have a blast, its just great place to buy all your tools. come here if you want to have a blast as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, William! We really appreciate the 5 stars and look forward to seeing you and your friends the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Friday Nov 3 30X CDN tire money back using triangle credit card
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a 5-star review! Were thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the benefits of our Triangle Rewards program and the opportunity to earn 30X CDN tire money back with your Triangle credit card. Were always striving to provide our customers with the best value and rewards, and were glad you had a positive experience. Your feedback encourages us to continue offering great deals and excellent service. We look forward to serving you again soon and hope to make your future visits just as enjoyable. Thank you for your support! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Bought online and went for my curbside pickup.That didnt work so I went inside.Was promptly greeted and asked if I needed any help,I answered yes I did.Showed my receipt  and was told to come to the rear of the store for my item.My item was bought out ,wheeled over to the parking lot( heavy & large item ) and was loaded for me in my car.DONE ! easy peasy.Took less than 3 minutes! Im buying online from now on and picking it up myself.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Buddcar! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! We will share your feedback about curbside with our online team so we can make improvements to this part of our business. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Drove down from Surrey to this Canadian Tire to pick up a couple items I ordered, was a little reluctant to drive down all the way to Van but the great service was worth it! A kind worker named Brandon helped load my purchases into my car, making this trip and transaction smooth and easy. Big help considering they were heavy for me. This location has a great team, thank you Brandon!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We really appreciate the 5-star review, Gabrielle. We are lucky to have team members like Brandon and are pleased to learn you found him helpful. We will be sure to recognize him for his efforts. Thank you for sharing your experience we look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: I ve had some bad experiences at this store before but I was having a hard time finding a product today and Mehdi went out of his way to get me info I needed. Was a good experience today.  There are employees who do want to help, you just have to find them.  Mehdi was one of them.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were happy to hear this about Mehdi. Thanks for taking the time to share your experience we look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Called on a Sunday to ask how quick I could get a new battery installed in my 2012 Ford Transit Connect. Amanda told me they were fully booked but would squeeze me in. In and out in less than 1 hour. Cost $237 total, including a new set of wipers installed. Completely Satisfied!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. Thanks for the 5-stars! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Missed their sale last week and Customer Service was willing to still give me the discount.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were happy to provide week before/ after pricing on our sale items. Thanks for the 5-stars we look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Nolando to the rescue! A superstar employee who made my shopping experience go from frustrating to absolutely wonderful. He helped me with my air conditioner needs - lifting, loading and user tips! Helpful and personable, I was more than impressed !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were happy to hear that Nolando was able to turn your frustrating experience around. We will be sure to recognize him for his efforts. Thanks for taking the time to share your 5-star shopping experience. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. Enjoy your new air conditioner! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: My husband bought a new portable grill and was SO excited about it. We brought it to a park picnic and the starter wouldnt work... Needless to say he was devastated. He brought it back to the Canadian Tire on Bentall and he was so stressed about getting it exchanged, but the staff there, Alyssa, helped him and it was no problem. Thanks Alyssa, he came back a very happy camper.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We apologize that the first portable grill you purchased was defective but are very pleased to hear about your 5-star experience with Alyssa. Thanks for taking the time to share your experience. Enjoy your new grill! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Honestly one of the best Canadian tires I ve ever been too. I use to go to the market crossing one but due to their being more of a firearms and hunting section at bentall location I started going here. First off joe from the hunting sectional is a phenomenal character and well versed and knowledgeable on almost all firearms and  goods!  His passionate level of service has kept me coming back to browse and shop there for the past year! The sporting good section has an amazing selection and mostly well stocked in what ever you need! He helped me pick out a required firearm and even introduced me to local areas and groups. My second Major deciding factor or point is the Automotive service section.  I had the fortunate luck to notice a problem before a long trip at this location and after being looked at by a third party in the parking lot I rushed into Canadian tire to see if it was service able that weekend! That s where I talked to bill! If you have a chance I highly recommend talking through bill, he was so calm and intelligent on the matters. even while waiting in line to talk to him he was able to deal with and successfully handle a very insistent customer. Never even breaking his calm and collected demeanour! I highly recommend this store and their personal!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We really appreciate the 5 stars, Nathan! Joe and Bill sure are great guys we re lucky to have them. We re happy to hear you value their expertise and service. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. Thanks for the review! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: My favorite neighborhood tire im there every week ! Lots of outdoors gear on upper floor.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tony, Were pleased to know you are satisfied with your shopping experience. Thanks for taking the time to provide us with a 5-star rating! We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Id like to thank whoever helped me over the phone with my online order today. I ordered a bike rack a week ago through the website and for pick up at another store. It was bought at a discount but by the time I ordered it they were out of stock, and unresponsive to my phone calls for me to get it from another store. The person I called in this store helped me get the bike rack from this store as they were in stock, and keep the discount.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Artur! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Enjoy your new bike. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: My partner and I came to Canadian tire to look for a couple things and as I was checking out the plants, Mei Lin stopped by and offered to help explain a few good options for my place. She was super helpful! Then later on, unfortunately when my partner was looking for something else, he couldnt find anyone and so poked his head into the back where two employees were talking and laughing. I guess this annoyed the one male employee, who was then quite rude to my partner as he was asking questions. Even yelled from the back no goodbye or thank you? when my partner closed the door. He also didnt help show us where we needed to look for a particular item. Luckily the day was saved again my Mei Lin because she happened to be walking by and helped us with a few options and showed us exactly where we could go. Thanks Mei Lin :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing this feedback, Emily. We are delighted to hear this about Mei Lin and will be sure to review your feedback with our team regarding the employees in the warehouse. We really appreciate the 5 stars and look forward to seeing you the next time your visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: I had excellent and understanding service from Tao, at the Parts Department, as well as earlier with Bertrand.  I thank them and found the customer service also excellent in an unusual situation. Very best, Maureen
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were delighted to hear this about out team! Thanks for the 5-stars we look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Fantastic service. Dug into their newly received stock to get me the product I was after. Thanks Sean (Sports Manager)

Timur had excellent customer service and knowledge about the products we were looking for.  He helped my son and I buy a fishing rod and proper bait. Highly recommend this location and Timur, thank you!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were happy to hear Timur provided excellent service. Thanks for taking the time to share your 5-star experience. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. Enjoy your new fishing gear! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: I purchased a big tub of diatomaceous earth and a steamer but realized I didnt need the DE so returned it the next day without any fuss.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Andre, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a positive review! Were glad to hear that you had a positive experience returning the diatomaceous earth and that our team made the process easy and hassle-free for you. We value your business and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: I just wanted to thank the customer service in the auto part with the name Bertrand.  He helped me a-lot by giving me helpful suggestions for my car and the equipment that i need to buy. Thank you again
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for leaving us a positive review, Andrew! We are thrilled to hear that Bertrand provided you with excellent customer service and was able to assist you with your automotive needs. We will be sure to share your feedback with Bertrand. Thank you again for choosing our store for your automotive needs, and we look forward to serving you again in the future. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Great experience dealing with this location. always have plenty of inventory and great items that you cant find at other big stores. I have recommended this location to many of my friends and family as you can usually find what you are looking for here. My favorite department is the firearms as Joe is very professional and personable and has been looking after us for years. Highly recommend this store!

Great selection I like that I can come into the store and pick up the things I want. Some stores seem to have more and more online only. Which is also useful but if I need it immediately I know I can run in and get it. Staff is helpful and friendly.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars Jacqueline! Were happy to hear yo u found our team helpful and friendly. We hope to see you again soon. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Oil change and tire rotation was done on my car, also replace filter. Work was done promptly and for a fair price. Ken and the rest of the staff was friendly and welcoming. Will comeback for maintenance again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your experience Florgelaine! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Employees are very friendly and helpful! Its a pleasure to shop there! Greatly appreciated!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your wonderful 5-star review, Shaohua! Were thrilled to hear that our employees were friendly and helpful during your shopping experience. We take pride in providing excellent customer service, and your feedback is greatly appreciated. Its our pleasure to serve you, and we look forward to continuing to provide you with a positive shopping experience in the future. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: First time coming here and i ve got to say it was an amazing experience. I came to buy a lawnmower and Joselin was more than happy to help me out. She even lifted it into my car! The store is always very well stocked.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your experience Hannah! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Well be sure to recognize Joselin for providing amazing service. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Great store. So big and spacious . Everything well stocked and usually available.  Great return customer service.   Self checkout aisle can be a little crazy at times as there are so many people usually here.   Only downfall, if you don t buy anything you have to push past everyone in the line to get out.  Great service overall .
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We really appreciate the 5 star review, Glenn. Thanks for taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to seeing you next time your visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: I liked it, 3 floors and everything you need
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Farhad! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: A pretty good selection of outdoor goods (camping, outdoor clothing, fishing, boating gear) Bought a game trail camera from there (couple of years ago).
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Jason! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Their garden section is well taken care and plants look happy..I ve planted so many gorgeous flowers- thanks for the tips from their knowledgeable staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Jaimies! We really appreciate the 5 stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Nice plants in your photo! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Good store with varied selection and helpful staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Dorothy! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: I went to the Bentall St. store on Nov. 19 and was helped by Danny. I had the best experience ever when he helped me with locating several items and explained how to use one, then helped me to find a washable metal-sided filter that I hadnt been able to locate anywhere. He was very informative, polite and extremely nice with me and others. I appreciated the exceptional service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Danny is definitely a star were so happy to hear about your experience and will be sure to recognize him for providing exceptional customer service. See you soon! - CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Today Dec 30th my husband and I had to pick up a part from Canadian Tire, at the parts desk we were working with a gentlemen named  Mihn I believe, He provided exceptional service went above and beyond super friendly I just want to commend him for being so helpful !!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Alysha! We really appreciate the 5 stars and will be sure to recocnize Mihn for his efforets. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: 5 stars for Clifford, who actually works in the auto department but ended up helping my husband & I find something in the main/upstairs portion of the store (:
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a fantastic 5-star review! We are thrilled to hear that Clifford went above and beyond to assist you and your husband during your visit to our store. Its wonderful to have team members like Clifford. We will be sure to pass along your kind words to Clifford and recognize him for his outstanding customer service. Thank you for choosing us, and we look forward to serving you again in the future! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Knowledgeable, Quick and efficient service when it came time for the federal inspection of our travel trailer. Great work guys!

The employees at this location is great I was helped by Kim T when I was doing my checkout and she was friendly, helpful. I forgot that I purchased a bin and she came out looking for me and I was very amazed by her great customer service. The amount of choices and variety at this location is wonderful! I will definitely come back again
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the kind review, Karen! Were sure lucky to have team members like Kim that work hard to provide a 5-star shopping experience. Happy youve found lots of variety at our store we look forward to seeing you during your next visit! Chris, General Manager

reviews.review_text: I wouldn t ever expect to give a Canadian Tire a 5 star review, but I had such a great experience at this location I thought I better share this positive feedback. As my family was preparing to leave for a camping trip early the next morning, we discovered our roof box was broken beyond repair, and since we don t camp light, getting a replacement was crucial. Canadian Tire s website showed a few models in stock, so a friend and I went down to check them out and buy one. It was about an hour before store closing, and I was feeling a bit stressed to be having to buy something without knowing much about the different brands and options. The automotive manager, Kyle, was happy to help, knew the products well, and had lots of good advice on things I wouldn t have thought to consider had he not suggested them. He even helped us get the roofbox installed on my car, and was cheerful and chill the whole time. I left the store confident with the purchase I had made and was so impressed by the quality of customer service.

Amazing customer service over the phone with Ward! I called in ahead of time to make sure they had an item because I had a terrible experience at another Canadian Tire location. You could hear that it was busy but Ward went out of his way to provide exceptional customer service. He asked for the item number and had support to make sure the item was available. He confirmed it was and told me what aisle it was in and the location where it would be in the aisle. I walked in, purchased the item and walked out within 5 minutes. My background to the whole experience below. I wanted to pick up Settlers of Catan and saw there were 7 available at the Cambie & 7th location. I went to the location and it took forever to find someone for support. When I did find someone, they told me it wasn t their department and to find the other rep. I found the other rep and had to chase after him as it felt like he was trying to avoid helping clients. Odd when you are hired to help clients. When I asked him about it he said if they are not on the shelf then it s going to be in a box somewhere as they are redoing their toy section. There were a bunch of boxes around the area but he was not even willing to walk over and look on the shelves or even offer to look into a couple of the boxes of items. He just said he can t help and smirked. I am purchasing this item as a family member of a friend of mine is battling cancer. This was a gift to bring their family together through the battle as I heard it s getting tougher at the moment. I was so angry that no one was willing to help. They were clearly unorganized and understaffed.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ward sure is amazing and were glad you think so too Jamie. Team Grandview is wishing your friend all the best with their battle against cancer. We hope the family enjoys the new game and it helps bring them closer together during this difficult time. Thanks for sharing your experience! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Good place to buy bikes and now offer is going on go and grab it
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Siri! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: I always have a great experience when I come here. The people are kind and understanding. I always feel comfortable getting anything done to my car, they are professional, and dont try to push me into things that I dont need! I love coming here because they always have what I need and are never sold out of anything!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review Katrina well see you next time! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: I visit this store regularly as it is convenient to me, and tonight had great service from Timur while looking at options for bikes for my daughter. Very knowledgeable, helpful, and patient.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Anne! We are happy to hear about your experience with Timur and really appreciate the 5-stars. Timur is a great guy we will be sure to recognize him for his efforts! We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: This store has 3 levels, very big and they always has promotions which you can t see at flyers. I bought and installed new set of tires here, every people is nice and professional especially Mr. Tao. Thanks
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Edwin! We really appreciate the 5 star review and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team
